apps.name: TestAPP1
apps.versionDescription:
TRUSTED SOURCES
• Download and update certain third party apps entirely through AltStore
• Add Trusted Sources directly from the new Sources page
• Trusted Sources are sources we’ve explicitly approved that meet our safety standards
• You can still sideload any .ipa you want via the "+" button in My Apps 
• Support for adding any source by URL will be coming later

ALTJIT
• Allows sideloaded apps to use Just-in-Time (JIT) compilation
• Long-press an app in My Apps, then choose “Enable JIT”
• JIT will remain enabled until the app is quit
• Requires iOS 14 or later
• Requires AltServer 1.5 or later

IMPROVED
• Adds Shane to credits and Patreon screen
• Loads “Friend Tier” Patrons much faster on Patreon screen

FIXED
• Fixed a potential crash when sideloading certain apps
• Fixed some apps having access to AltStore’s app group after being (de-)activated
• Fixed Core Data error when not connected to internet
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: TestAPP2
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
This beta fixes the following issues:

• Using Apple IDs that contain capital letters
• Using Apple IDs with 2FA enabled without any trusted devices
• Repeatedly asking some users to sign in every refresh
• "Incorrect Apple ID or password" error after changing Apple ID email address
• “Application is missing application-identifier” error when sideloading or (de-)activating certain apps
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore adds support for 3rd party sources, allowing you to download apps from other developers directly through AltStore.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, coming soon for everyone else.

news.title: Delta Now Available
news.caption: Finally, relive your favorite NES, SNES, GB(C), GBA, and N64 games.

news.title: Welcome to AltStore
news.caption: Please read the FAQ for help with installing apps.

news.title: Sideloading is Here!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.3 to install any app directly from Files.

news.title: iOS 13.4 Fixes App Crashes
news.caption: Update to iOS 13.4 to fix some sideloaded apps crashing on launch.

news.title: Clip Now Available!
news.caption: Finally, a clipboard manager that can run in the background — no jailbreak required.

news.title: Delta, Meet Nintendo DS
news.caption: Update to Delta 1.3 to relive all your favorite Nintendo DS games.

news.title: #StandWithUkraine
news.caption: Find out how you can help support those impacted by the Russian invasion.

news.title: The Biggest AltServer Update Yet!
news.caption: Update to AltServer 1.5 to use AltJIT and other exciting new features.

news.title: More Apps in AltStore!
news.caption: Update to AltStore 1.5 to easily download some of our favorite apps.
